ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Spriggan
ModMetaData.author: pphhyy, Rick G., SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Spriggans is the first in hopefully many SkyRIM mods to be made this year. This mod adds 9 spriggan type creatures to the game, for you to murder, or add to your hippy colony. Eventually we will also release an alchemy mod, which will become the main reason to murder the poor creatures for parts. Currently they just make cutting down trees dangerous, as well as good companions if you have the patience to befriend them. They are faster and stronger than pawns, a great threat to deal with, or great benefit to a colony.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
-Requires Harmony
-Requires Vanilla Expanded Framework

-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
-Most of the art done by pphhyy
-Additional art done by Ranger Rick and SirMashedPotato
-C# and xml done by SirMashedPotato
-Descriptions tidied by Kriana
-Sounds used made by Mike Koenig from http://soundbible.com/
